plot: A neighborhood in the Hollywood Hills is terrorized by a group of self-described modern day vampires who then collide with a disgraced LAPD Detective and his rebellious teenage daughter.
title: 101: Modern Los Angeles Vampires
plot_es: A neighborhood in the Hollywood Hills is terrorized by a group of self-described modern day vampires who then collide with a disgraced LAPD Detective and his rebellious teenage daughter.
plot_en: A neighborhood in the Hollywood Hills is terrorized by a group of self-described modern day vampires who then collide with a disgraced LAPD Detective and his rebellious teenage daughter.
